body:
Running with the current tip of develop if I create a spack GPG key, I cannot view it with `spack gpg list`, nor is any meaningful error returned.

Example
```
# spack gpg create david david@example.com
gpg: keyring `/root/spack/opt/spack/gpg/secring.gpg' created
gpg: keyring `/root/spack/opt/spack/gpg/pubring.gpg' created
gpg: skipping control `%no-protection' ()
gpg: /root/spack/opt/spack/gpg/trustdb.gpg: trustdb created
gpg: key C276E78E marked as ultimately trusted
# spack gpg list
# spack gpg export  key.key C276E78E
# cat key.key
-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----
Version: GnuPG v2
...
```
title: Spack GPG list doesn't return anything with no arguments specified
